name: FIT IN
description:
Very Important Note: The screenshots above don't represent game's real resolution due to some issues occurred while resizing the images.

Challenge Yourself
Test your skills, test your reflexes, test your calculations, test your patience and be surprised how much you progressed.

Enjoy the Simplicity
No complex controls to remember. No long intros and outros to wait for. No dozens of things to keep in mind. Just click, play and have fun.

That Feeling When You Beat a Level
Exactly.

Various Possibilities
Try different paths and movement methods to achieve your goal, or to die less.

Create Your Own Playstyle
Take it slow and make it tense. Perform tight turns and look cool. Experiment with different combinations and find numerous ways to move.

FIT IN is a challenging casual game in which you play as the red square and try to reach your destination without touching any obstacles. As you play, you will discover new ways to move and try different paths to find the ones that suit your movement style best.
